attributes.action: Enable the Peacock Surgery to move to new premises from which they can provide improved, more diverse services for their patients and the local community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The partners of the Peacock Surgery have been striving for over 10yrs to improve their services and having been provided with an opportunity by a neighbouring PCT in 2005 to purchase new premises they were finally declined this opportunity by the new (re-structured PCT)in March 2007.No consultation by the PCT was entered into involving the Partners or the patients and feel this is an unjust outcome.
